Ryshi Facial Toner

Brand: Ryshi

Category: Toners/Astringents

Brand: Ryshi

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, POLYSORBATE 20, SODIUM LEVULINATE, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM HYALURONATE, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, FRUCTOSE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, UREA, ALLANTOIN, MALTOSE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM LACTATE, SODIUM PCA, TREHALOSE, GLUCOSE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
